column2: Latest;Koh Kong:------ At 9.30 am on July 15
column4: a patrol of the Koh Kong Defense Force No. 2 were alerted to a fisherman who had fallen overboard.------They sped to the scene and rescued the sailor
column5: who was beginning to flounder with leg cramps.------He thanked his rescuers and went on his way. ------https://postnews.com.kh/local/462359------*Note
column6: the thankful fisherman does seem rather dry in his photos.
